description:
$7 Adv/ $10 DOS / Age 18 And Up

Tickets:
http://www.ticketweb.com/event/funksgiving-cosmic-brownie-haewa-stereo-funk-n-waffles-music-hall-tickets/7825805?REFERRAL_ID=twfb

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"Haewa can be better described by what it isn't. The group jams, but it isn't a jam band. It circles psychedelic rock, but doesn't get lost in the ether. It's a rock 'n' roll band that doesn't adhere to merely the one, the four, and the five. It's odd, but not intentionally obtuse...." - Frank DeBlase

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cosmic Brownie is an electronic/funk infused hip-hop duo from Rochester, NY, comprised of MC, Clayboy Spoons, and DJ/multi-instrumentalist, Abe Froman.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Stereo Nest uses the singular human mind as the central processor between thought, freely controlled looping machines, and electric guitar. Live creations of electronic sounds move amorphous within a non-mechanical format, bleeding life into the circuitry, aiming for symbiosis between man and machine.
name: Funksgiving! Cosmic Brownie, Haewa, Stereo Nest
